title: Does any of u guys know how to know what skin or present my friend sent me?
body: When I login my account, I received a notification that I got a present from my friend, but I quickly closed it. So I wouldn't have the chance to know what it is. Could any of u guys give me some suggestions or solutions to this kind of problem? Thank you so much!

replies.body:
I went ahead and looked at your recent content history, and it looks like that notification was probably letting you know that you received the 2017 April Fool's Icon! It looks like this, so let me know if this sounds about right!

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-b5Xdt2T9aj0/WN8ZUUM_HRI/AAAAAAAAhEQ/GEouzTC7-PYBU4gjFu6w0k2YigTU4m8pwCLcB/s1600/LOL_CMS_65_Article_02.jpg
Thx BRO, I see. Thank you for letting me know that!
